uas.lntv.pacmangame.Maps

Class MenuMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • uas.lntv.pacmangame.Maps.Map
      • uas.lntv.pacmangame.Maps.MenuMap

  • public class MenuMap
extends Map
    This class provides a simple map for the purpose of creating menus. It will not create collectables besides the ones already provided by the tmx-mapfile
